about_the_game:
Animalistic is a fast-paced and ultraviolent shooter that fuses together the feel of both classic and modern FPS games.
As one of the last humans on earth, you must ferociously wipe out the remaining animals that are hunting you down and save mankind!


Pick from an arsenal of different weapons and your fists to brutally clear room after room of difficult yet fun-to-fight enemies.
Animalistic's fluid gameplay allows for fast and fun movement and combat.


Animalistic features 20 handcrafted story levels featuring God of War's Robert Craighead!
And endless wave maps allowing you to test how long you can survive against waves of enemies!
Upgrade your stats and high scores on each level and unlock fun and uncover a dark hidden story.


Play alongside a custom soundtrack created specifically for this game!

-------------------------------

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES - READ THIS NOTICE BEFORE PLAYING

A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain kinds of flashing lights or light patterns. These persons, or even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy, may experience epileptic symptoms or seizures while playing video games. If you or any of your relatives has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult a physician if you or your child experience any of the following symptoms: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions. Parents should watch for or ask their children about the above symptoms.

You may reduce the risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures by taking the following precautions: sit farther from the screen, use a smaller screen, play in a well-lit room, and do not play when you are drowsy or fatigued.

content_descriptors.notes: Stylized cartoony violence towards humanoid animals.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.50Ghz Intel core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5750 1GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Animalistic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Animalistic is a fast-paced, ultraviolent, and stylish indie FPS game where you brutally clear room after room of creepy humanoid animals. Featuring a story-mode and endless wave mode!
